sourcesContent:
// src/i18n.js
import i18n from 'i18next';
import { initReactI18next } from 'react-i18next';
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector';

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .use(initReactI18next)
  .init({
    fallbackLng: 'sr',
    debug: false,
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false,
    },
    resources: {
      sr: {
        translation: {
          title: "MindLoop AI Widget za va≈° sajt",
          subtitle: "Automatizujte komunikaciju sa klijentima uz AI asistenta koji radi 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ Isprobaj demo odmah",
          benefits: {
            instant: "Instant odgovori",
            smart: "Pametan AI",
            easy: "Laka integracija",
            instantDesc: "Korisnici dobijaju odgovor u sekundi ‚Äì bez ƒçekanja.",
            smartDesc: "Razume pitanja i koristi znanje va≈°e firme.",
            easyDesc: "Dodaje se bez problema na va≈° postojeƒái sajt ‚Äì bez kodiranja.",
          },
          navKontakt: "Kontakt",
          forWhom: "Za koga je MindLoop AI?",
          sectors: "Savr≈°eno re≈°enje za sve sektore sa ƒçestim pitanjima korisnika.",
          sectorsList: [
            "üè® Turizam",
            "üöó Rent-a-car",
            "üè´ Edukacija",
            "üõç E-commerce",
            "üì¶ Dostava",
            "üì± IT servisi"
          ],
          footerEmail: "üìß Email",
          footerPhone: "üìû Telefon",
          featuresTitle: "üîç ≈†ta sve na≈° sistem omoguƒáava:",
          features: [
            "Automatski odgovara na najƒçe≈°ƒáa pitanja",
            "Personalizovan sadr≈æaj za svaku firmu",
            "Ne zahteva dodatni softver ni kodiranje",
            "Lako se integri≈°e na bilo koji sajt",
            "Radi 24/7 bez pauze ili nadzora"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ Automatski AI asistent:",
          aiAssistant1: "Na≈° inteligentni pomoƒánik mo≈æe trenutno da generi≈°e opis va≈°e firme, napravi strukturu sajta i predlo≈æi sadr≈æaj na osnovu va≈°e delatnosti.",
          aiAssistant2: "Samo pove≈æete na≈° vid≈æet ‚Äì i on odmah kreƒáe da komunicira sa klijentima u va≈°e ime.",
          aiAssistant3: "To je kao da imate liƒçnog savetnika koji nikada ne spava.",
          stats: {
            fast: "Odgovor za 1 sekundu",
            users: "1000+ korisnika",
            uptime: "99.99% dostupnost",
            langs: "Vi≈°e jezika",
          },
          faqTitle: "Najƒçe≈°ƒáa pitanja",
          faq: [
            { q: "Kako se integri≈°e?", a: "Jednostavno ubacite na≈° kod na svoj sajt ‚Äì mi vam poma≈æemo u svemu." },
            { q: "Da li mo≈æe da radi i na mobilnim sajtovima?", a: "Naravno, widget je responzivan i radi svuda." },
            { q: "Koliko ko≈°ta?", a: "Trenutno nudimo besplatan demo, a komercijalni planovi zavise od potreba." }
          ]
        }
      },
      en: {
        translation: {
          title: "MindLoop AI Widget for Your Website",
          subtitle: "Automate client communication with an AI assistant that works 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ Try the demo now",
          benefits: {
            instant: "Instant answers",
            smart: "Smart AI",
            easy: "Easy integration",
            instantDesc: "Clients get answers in seconds ‚Äì no waiting.",
            smartDesc: "Understands questions and uses your business data.",
            easyDesc: "Easily added to your existing website ‚Äì no coding required.",
          },
          navKontakt: "Contact",
          forWhom: "Who is MindLoop AI for?",
          sectors: "Perfect for any sector with frequent customer questions.",
          sectorsList: [
            "üè® Tourism",
            "üöó Rent-a-car",
            "üè´ Education",
            "üõç E-commerce",
            "üì¶ Delivery",
            "üì± IT services"
          ],
          footerEmail: "üìß Email",
          footerPhone: "üìû Phone",
          featuresTitle: "üîç What our system enables:",
          features: [
            "Automatically answers common questions",
            "Personalized content for every company",
            "No extra software or coding needed",
            "Easily integrates with any website",
            "Works 24/7 without breaks or supervision"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ Automatic AI Assistant:",
          aiAssistant1: "Our intelligent assistant can instantly generate a company description, site structure, and suggest content based on your business type.",
          aiAssistant2: "You just plug in our widget ‚Äì and it starts chatting with customers on your behalf.",
          aiAssistant3: "It‚Äôs like having a personal consultant that never sleeps.",
          stats: {
            fast: "1 second response",
            users: "1000+ users",
            uptime: "99.99% uptime",
            langs: "Multilingual"
          },
          faqTitle: "Frequently Asked Questions",
          faq: [
            { q: "How do I integrate it?", a: "Simply copy-paste our script ‚Äì we‚Äôll help you if needed." },
            { q: "Is it mobile-friendly?", a: "Yes, it works great on mobile and tablets." },
            { q: "What's the pricing?", a: "We offer a free demo and flexible plans based on your needs." }
          ]
        }
      },
      fr: {
        translation: {
          title: "Widget MindLoop AI pour votre site",
          subtitle: "Automatisez la communication client avec un assistant IA disponible 24h/24.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ Essayez la d√©mo",
          benefits: {
            instant: "R√©ponses instantan√©es",
            smart: "IA intelligente",
            easy: "Int√©gration facile",
            instantDesc: "Les clients obtiennent une r√©ponse imm√©diate.",
            smartDesc: "Comprend les questions et utilise vos donn√©es.",
            easyDesc: "Ajout√© facilement √† votre site existant ‚Äì sans code.",
          },
          navKontakt: "Contact",
          forWhom: "√Ä qui s'adresse MindLoop AI ?",
          sectors: "Parfait pour tous les secteurs avec des questions fr√©quentes.",
          sectorsList: [
            "üè® Tourisme",
            "üöó Location de voiture",
            "üè´ √âducation",
            "üõç E-commerce",
            "üì¶ Livraison",
            "üì± Services IT"
          ],
          footerEmail: "üìß Email",
          footerPhone: "üìû T√©l√©phone",
          featuresTitle: "üîç Ce que notre syst√®me permet :",
          features: [
            "R√©pond automatiquement aux questions fr√©quentes",
            "Contenu personnalis√© pour chaque entreprise",
            "Aucun logiciel ou codage requis",
            "S'int√®gre facilement √† tout site Web",
            "Fonctionne 24h/24 sans interruption"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ Assistant AI automatique :",
          aiAssistant1: "Notre assistant intelligent peut g√©n√©rer instantan√©ment la description de votre entreprise, cr√©er la structure du site et sugg√©rer du contenu selon votre domaine.",
          aiAssistant2: "Vous connectez simplement notre widget ‚Äì il commence √† interagir avec les clients en votre nom.",
          aiAssistant3: "C‚Äôest comme un conseiller personnel qui ne dort jamais.",
          stats: {
            fast: "R√©ponse en 1 seconde",
            users: "1000+ utilisateurs",
            uptime: "99.99% disponibilit√©",
            langs: "Multilingue"
          },
          faqTitle: "Questions fr√©quentes",
          faq: [
            { q: "Comment l'int√©grer ?", a: "Copiez-collez simplement notre script ‚Äì nous vous aidons si n√©cessaire." },
            { q: "Est-ce mobile friendly ?", a: "Oui, le widget est r√©actif et fonctionne partout." },
            { q: "Quel est le prix ?", a: "Nous proposons une d√©mo gratuite et des plans sur mesure." }
          ]
        }
      },
      ru: {
        translation: {
          title: "–í–∏–¥–∂–µ—Ç MindLoop AI –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞",
          subtitle: "–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –ò–ò-–∞—Å—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "üöÄ –ü–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–µ–º–æ",
          benefits: {
            instant: "–ú–≥–Ω–æ–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã",
            smart: "–£–º–Ω—ã–π –ò–ò",
            easy: "–õ—ë–≥–∫–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è",
            instantDesc: "–û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –∑–∞ —Å–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥—ã ‚Äì –±–µ–∑ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è.",
            smartDesc: "–ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç –≤–∞—à—É –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é.",
            easyDesc: "–õ–µ–≥–∫–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à —Å–∞–π—Ç ‚Äì –±–µ–∑ –∫–æ–¥–∞.",
          },
          navKontakt: "–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç",
          forWhom: "–ö–æ–º—É –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç MindLoop AI?",
          sectors: "–û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω–æ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –¥–ª—è –≤—Å–µ—Ö –æ—Ç—Ä–∞—Å–ª–µ–π —Å —á–∞—Å—Ç—ã–º–∏ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞–º–∏.",
          sectorsList: [
            "üè® –¢—É—Ä–∏–∑–º",
            "üöó –ü—Ä–æ–∫–∞—Ç –∞–≤—Ç–æ",
            "üè´ –û–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ",
            "üõç –≠–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ç–æ—Ä–≥–æ–≤–ª—è",
            "üì¶ –î–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∞",
            "üì± IT —É—Å–ª—É–≥–∏"
          ],
          footerEmail: "üìß –≠–ª. –ø–æ—á—Ç–∞",
          footerPhone: "üìû –¢–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω",
          featuresTitle: "üîç –ß—Ç–æ —É–º–µ–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—à–∞ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞:",
          features: [
            "–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—á–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –∑–∞–¥–∞–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã",
            "–ü–µ—Ä—Å–æ–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç –¥–ª—è –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏",
            "–ù–µ —Ç—Ä–µ–±—É–µ—Ç –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –ü–û –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ–¥–∞",
            "–õ–µ–≥–∫–æ –≤—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–π —Å–∞–π—Ç",
            "–†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç 24/7 –±–µ–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ä—ã–≤–æ–≤ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª—è"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "ü§ñ –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π AI-–∞—Å—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç:",
          aiAssistant1: "–ù–∞—à –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç—É–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø–æ–º–æ—â–Ω–∏–∫ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –º–≥–Ω–æ–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Å–≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –æ–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏, —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞ –∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç.",
          aiAssistant2: "–í—ã –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–∞–µ—Ç–µ –Ω–∞—à –≤–∏–¥–∂–µ—Ç ‚Äî –∏ –æ–Ω –Ω–∞—á–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç –≤–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –æ—Ç –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –∏–º–µ–Ω–∏.",
          aiAssistant3: "–≠—Ç–æ –∫–∞–∫ –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ–Ω—Å—É–ª—å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ç, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –Ω–∏–∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω–µ —Å–ø–∏—Ç.",
          stats: {
            fast: "1 —Å–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥–∞ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç",
            users: "1000+ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π",
            uptime: "99.99% –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏",
            langs: "–ú–Ω–æ–≥–æ—è–∑—ã—á–Ω—ã–π"
          },
          faqTitle: "–ß–∞—Å—Ç–æ –∑–∞–¥–∞–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–µ –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã",
          faq: [
            { q: "–ö–∞–∫ –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å?", a: "–ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ –≤—Å—Ç–∞–≤—å—Ç–µ –Ω–∞—à —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç ‚Äî –ø–æ–º–æ–∂–µ–º –ø—Ä–∏ –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º–æ—Å—Ç–∏." },
            { q: "–†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –º–æ–±–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö?", a: "–î–∞, –æ–Ω –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –∞–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–µ–Ω." },
            { q: "–°–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Å—Ç–æ–∏—Ç?", a: "–ë–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –¥–µ–º–æ-–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—è –∏ —Ç–∞—Ä–∏—Ñ—ã –ø–æ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—É." }
          ]
        }
      }
    }
  });

export default i18n;
